article.title: Schedule approval moment
article.label: LCO Milestone
article.description: LCO Milestone closes Inception Phase and approves all mandatory project management artifacts: Schedule, Risk List, Budget and Specification (SRS).
article.keywords: LCO milestone, inception phase, budget, specification, project planning, project charter, continuous integration, software outsourcing, offshore development, distributed programming,

text.p: The Lifecycle Objectives (LCO) Milestone is a moment when the [Specification]({% href process/scope/specification %}), [Schedule]({% href process/cost/budget}">Budget, and the <a href="${url:process/time/schedule %}) are ready and presented to you for approval.
At this point, you examine the Lifecycle Objectives of the project, and decide either to proceed or to cancel it.
If the project is approved at this moment, we continue to work.
If project is not approved for any reason, project is closed and you pay only the [Retainer]({% href process/cost/retainer %}) for the work done on Specification development.

concepts.c2: The Schedule is prepared during Inception Phase and presented at the LCO Milestone
concepts.c5: All functional and non-functional requirements are listed in Specification
